item.title: Critical flaws found in interoperability backbone: FHIR APIs vulnerable to abuse
item.description: Researcher Alissa Knight found pervasive authorization vulnerabilities in an app ecosystem of 48 FHIR apps and APIs that enabled access to patient data. APIs are intended as the backbone of health care interoperability. Read on scmagazine.com
